SEARCH
Package ca.mcgill.splendorclient.model.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
ca.mcgill.splendorclient.model.cards.Card
public class Card extends Object
Represents a Splendor Card with id, prestige, tokenBonus, cardType, discount and cost This class implements the Flyweight design pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int id, int prestige, TokenType tokenBonus, CardType cardType, int discount, int[] cost)
      Creates a card.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the card
      prestige - The prestige earned upon purchasing the card
      tokenBonus - The bonus received upon purchasing the card
      cardType - The type of card
      discount - The card's discount
      cost - The cost of the card
